trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>evento si verifica solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>proprietà è impostata o dai relativi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando si gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>evento, il testo della descrizione è specificato nel gestore può essere visualizzato ogni volta che il puntatore è su una cella e il controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A>valore della proprietà è `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellToolTips%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>evento è utile quando si desidera visualizzare le descrizioni comandi in base allo stato corrente o al valore di una cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>evento si verifica anche ogni volta che il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà viene recuperata, a livello di codice o quando il puntatore del mouse entra in una cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>le proprietà per determinare lo stato o il valore di una cella e utilizzare queste informazioni per impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellToolTipTextNeededEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene inizializzata con il valore della cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>proprietà, che sostituisce il valore dell'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>evento quando si lavora con grandi quantità di dati, per evitare il calo delle prestazioni dell'impostazione del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A>valore per più celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellToolTipTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedure consigliate per ridimensionare il controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il testo della descrizione comando.

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a cell.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà contiene inizialmente il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà se è stata impostata per una cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ToolTipText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
Il testo della descrizione comando corrente.
